channel.title: Rune-Spice
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://rune-spice.com/forum"]Fourms[/URL] [u]Information[/u] Welcome to the official Rune-Spice economy server development thread. This server is owned and programmed by myself and my two friend Shawn and Tanner. We will be looking to create a custom and fun challenging server. [u]Developers[/u] -Anthony -Shawn -Tanner -Also My friend Pulse when he wants too [u]Update log[/u]
Finished configuring 508 objects Added 508 weapon stances and animations Player and Npc Clipping Event handler Skill handler Task scheduler
[u]Skills[/u] [u]Combat[/u] -Melee --Attack [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Attack"]Info[/URL] --Defense [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Defense"]Info[/URL] --Strength [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Strength"]Info[/URL] -Range [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Range"]Info[/URL] -Magic [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Magic"]Info[/URL] -Prayer [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Prayer"]Info[/URL] -Will vote on constitution [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/constitution"]Info[/URL] [u]Non-Combat Skills[/u] -Crafting [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/crafting"]Info[/URL] -Mining [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/mining"]Info[/URL] -Smithing [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/smithing"]Info[/URL] -Fishing [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/fishing"]Info[/URL] -Cooking [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/cooking"]Info[/URL] -Firemaking [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/firemaking"]Info[/URL] -Woodcutting [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Woodcutting"]Info[/URL] -Runecrafting [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Runecrafting"]Info[/URL] -Agility [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Agility"]Info[/URL] -Herblore [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Herblore"]Info[/URL] -Thieving [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Thieving"]Info[/URL] -Fletching [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Flecting"]Info[/URL] -Slayer [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Slayer"]Info[/URL] -Farming [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Farming"]Info[/URL] [u]Training Locations[/u] Rock Crabs Yaks Bandit Camps Giants Custom Dungeons [u]Bosses[/u] Godwars King Black Dragon Chaos Elemental Dagganoth Monsters Kalphite Queen [u]Minigames[/u] Barrows Pest Control Duel Arena Fight Pits Fight Caves [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2zqa7a8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/343t36g.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/33m4doy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/98eihy.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: Rune-Spice
item.dc:creator: @angelfallen angelfallen
item.description:
@angelfallen wrote:

luna-scape:

So all your ‘team’ did was adding a rock crabs training location?

No as of right now we have just finished up configuring 508 objects, Added 508 weapon stances and animations, Player and Npc Clipping and started adding transportation via boats and gnome gliders.

Read full topic
